text: Kare-ra wa anata ni taishite, don'yokudearu. Mā miruga ī. Kare-ra ni kiken ga otozureru to, rinjū no hito no yō ni medama o gurutto mawashite, anata o jukushi suru. Soshite kiken ga saruto yoi mono bakari musabori, kuchibiru o togara sete anata gata o tsūretsu ni hinan suru. Korera no mono wa shinjade wanai. Arrā wa, kare-ra no okonai o mueki ni nasa reru. Sore wa arrā ni wa yōina kotodearu
